name: Melodio
description: Modular workspace to explore & create music without imposing guidelines on the creative process. Break down barriers of music theory, give inspiration and axes of exploration through Creative Pods.
highlights: Real-time audio processing with Web Audio API for note onset detection and pitch recognition
AI integration with ChatGPT API for structured musical data generation
User-adaptive interface designed to adapt to individual workflows and skill levels
Low-latency audio recognition and API performance optimization

name: MapShot
description: Mobile-first application designed to help photographers build an ecosystem of filterable artistic locations. Upload photos, vote on moods, reference ideal time, light and affluence.
highlights: Geotag, catalog, and discover photo locations with mood filtering
Cost-efficient API optimization minimizing Mapbox calls while maintaining smooth interactions
Drawer-based navigation with fast-filtering system for instant results
Lazy loading and resource caching for seamless performance across varying networks
